title: BT41011: Transport Phenomena In Bioprocess - Quick Facts

Course name | Transport Phenomena In Bioprocess

Credits | 3

Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Unified approach to physical rate processes associated with momentum, mass and energy transport. Differential and integral treatment on the conservation laws. Momentum, mass and energy transfer in laminar and turbulent flow with applications to interphase. Macroscopic balance. Molecular transport properties.
